1.title: Family Business vs Dreams
1.description: Your family expects you to join their successful business, but your heart calls you toward becoming an artist.
1.heartResponse: Follow your artistic passion and creative calling
1.dutyResponse: Honor family legacy and traditional expectations
1.gitaWisdom: Arjuna questioned his duty as a warrior. The Gita reveals that true dharma aligns with your authentic nature while honoring responsibilities.
actionSteps: Propose trial period for artistic goals
Seek mentorship from others with similar experience
1.verse: Better is one's own dharma, though imperfectly performed, than the dharma of another well performed.
